channel.title: What source should i start my new server off (not Zaron's isle V.3)
channel.description:
Hello! I'm making a source that is like no other Zaron server! The starting place will be somewhere where youve already been on runescape. But first, i need to find a source first! (NOTE: Zarex team: i'm doing this one alone and doing Zaron's isle V.3 with you)
These are just SOME sources off the top of my mind... if you would like to prefer a source, please comment it! This idea ive been thinking of for a few days and i want to be able to express it so i need a source!
Thank you, -Zaron

item.title: What source should i start my new server off (not Zaron's isle V.3)
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

[quote="-Legend-, post:14, topic:125691"][quote author=i_own__u link=topic=175952.msg1624273#msg1624273 date=1185251294]
I suggest to use Hybrid Isle’z
All junk in Server.Java and Client.Java are deleted
And its TestScape (very stable source :P)
[/quote]

TestScape isn’t stable…[/quote]

None of these servers are stable, seeing as they are all winterlove’s server. As time went on, servers’ instability increased exponentially.

Read full topic
item.source: What source should i start my new server off (not Zaron's isle V.3)

item.dc:creator: @Zaron Zaron

@Zaron wrote:

MMcgrady… i like your source… does it have full specials? or just whip?

Read full topic
item.source: What source should i start my new server off (not Zaron's isle V.3)

item.title: What source should i start my new server off (not Zaron's isle V.3)
item.dc:creator: @MMcgrady1 MMcgrady1
item.description:
@MMcgrady1 wrote:

ShadowShaft:

[quote]client.java is only 909kb big!

Mines 30Kb >.> On the server I work on[/quote]I think it’s a big progess, seing as I don’t understand handlers fully, thing is, most sources are 1mb+ for example, Zdiddy, I had that before, I think I’ve made some progress, don’t dis me. I’ll make handlers when I learn how to do the importing, like import.java.lang, etc. Now, I’m not positive on this, but If my client.java was small, and I had tons of other files that would make up for it, server would be slow, because of all the importing of mutehandler all the way to client.java etc. You would need a great amount of ram for it to be non-laggy, I think…

Read full topic

item.title: What source should i start my new server off (not Zaron's isle V.3)
item.dc:creator: @Zaron Zaron
item.description:
@Zaron wrote:

[quote=“MMcgrady1, post:23, topic:125691”]United PK, I might give you my new source :D. It’s great, so many bugs fixed and stuff, and client.java is only 909kb big! Here’s some features:

Server Features: REAL SLAYER TOWER WITH MOVING MONSTERS! Anti SYIpkpker crash. Not able to wear a 2h and a shield at the same time Working mute and unmute Fully working prayer! Fully working report abuse system! Separate skills training areas. KBD lair. Jad lair. NPC Training Island. Kalphite Lair with working KQ. Barrows Minigame. Fully working Castle Wars-I Loot I- Good weapon timers. Not able to mass when PKing Full character face! Real special bar for whip. Barrows mini-game. Disabled teleports. Server won't lag, unless many people are on. Training isn't fast. Kalphite and KBD lairs. 126 max combat level. Crafting works. Mining works. Agility works (use glory tele). Herblore works. Cooking works. Runecrafting works. Farming works. Fishing works. Woodcutting works. Slayer works. Fletching works. Global objects with NO lag! Working Dueling! Customized training room. 99 max stat. Auto-restarter Anti Azn Client crashing Anti Sly Cheat client Anti Azn cheat client commands[/quote]

I would like to see your source plz!

and adam… I lol put alot of effort into my other servers so yea… i lol just want one that i can work with with not much frustration… so yea…

Read full topic

item.title: What source should i start my new server off (not Zaron's isle V.3)
item.dc:creator: @MMcgrady1 MMcgrady1
item.description:
@MMcgrady1 wrote:

United PK, I might give you my new source :D. It’s great, so many bugs fixed and stuff, and client.java is only 909kb big! Here’s some features:

Server Features: Great server.java, deleted useless crap in it. REAL SLAYER TOWER WITH MOVING MONSTERS! Anti SYIpkpker crash. Not able to wear a 2h and a shield at the same time Working mute and unmute Fully working prayer! Fully working report abuse system! Separate skills training areas. KBD lair. Jad lair. NPC Training Island. Kalphite Lair with working KQ. Barrows Minigame. Fully working Castle Wars-I Loot I- Good weapon timers. Not able to mass when PKing Full character face! Real special bar for whip. Barrows mini-game. Disabled teleports. Server won't lag, unless many people are on. Training isn't fast. Kalphite and KBD lairs. 126 max combat level. Crafting works. Mining works. Agility works (use glory tele). Herblore works. Cooking works. Runecrafting works. Farming works. Fishing works. Woodcutting works. Slayer works. Fletching works. Global objects with NO lag! Working Dueling! Customized training room. 99 max stat. Auto-restarter Anti Azn Client crashing Anti Sly Cheat client Anti Azn cheat client commands

Read full topic
